mapper.select: SELECT A.cart_id cartId, A.user_id, B.product_id productId, A.quantity , B.nm_kor nmKor, B.nm_eng nmEng, B.price, c.sale_price salePrice, B.pic FROM t_cart A left JOIN t_product B ON A.product_id = B.product_id left JOIN t_sale C ON B.product_id = C.product_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") = curdate()
mapper.insert: insert into t_cart set user_id = #{userId}, product_id = #{productId}, quantity = #{quantity}, buy_yn = 0
mapper.update: update t_cart set quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = current_timestamp() where cart_id = #{cartId}
